content: the dragon tail skinny scarf is the perfect accessory for both function and a pop of color quickly made with only a half cake of lion brand mandala yarn you ll have enough for yourself and a gift as well >this pattern is available for free on my website here 1 if you prefer a pdf is also available for purchase 1 https //makeitcrochet com/dragon-tail-skinny-scarf-free-crochet-pattern/
